text: Jürgen Erich Schrempp (born September 15, 1944) is a German businessman. He was the CEO of Daimler-Benz from May 1995 to December 31, 2005, which became DaimlerChrysler. Schrempp was the architect of the merger joint venture between Daimler Benz and Chrysler. He was born in Freiburg, Germany. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:German businesspeople Category:People from Freiburg im Breisgau
title: Jürgen E. Schrempp
